mastergl.pdp

Class WayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
      • mastergl.pdp.WayManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, StateChangeableVibrator

    public class WayManager
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
implements android.os.Parcelable, StateChangeableVibrator
    This class is meant to be a handler for parsing json file and drawing the way on a map. At the end of the task performed in background, it draws the polyline on the map argument. In the future, this class will treat all the other node of the json file.
    See Also:
    AsyncTask.execute(Object[])

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Method called when the json file is stock in the JsonObject member. It extracts the polyline attributes from it, draw it on the map and initialize the list of points and the current location.

      • intersectLocationToPath

        public com.google.maps.android.geometry.Point intersectLocationToPath(com.google.maps.android.geometry.Point location)
        This function moves the location given in arguments to the current path following a right angle.
        Parameters:
        location - a location x y format.
        Returns:
        the intersection between the current path and the perpendicular line passing through the parameter.

      • getAngleFromNorth

        public float getAngleFromNorth(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng origin,
                      com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng to)
        From the first location (basically the current one) to the next step by the north axe, give the angle between those data.
        Parameters:
        origin - The first point.
        to - the next point to go.
        Returns:
        an angle in degrees.

      • decodePoly

        public static java.util.List<com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng> decodePoly(java.lang.String encoded)
        In a json file, the polyline attribute is encoded. This method decode it.
        Parameters:
        encoded - the encoded string.
        Returns:
        a list of LatLng object containing all the point needed to draw the polyline.
        See Also:
        LatLng
